cause.description:
The Breast Cancer 3-Day is a 60-mile walk over the course of three days. Net proceeds benefit the Susan G. Komen Breast Cancer Foundation and the National Philanthropic Trust, funding important breast cancer research, education, screening, and treatment.
Support me in finding a cure and
DONATE AT MY PAGE
www.the3day.org/michigan07/amandahamilton
(go to this link and donate, don't donate on facebook it is apparently sketchy, plus you will help me reach my goal of $2,200)
1. I believe that a world without breast cancer is not far away and I will do my part to ensure that I will see that day
2. People should be educated on the importance of breast health
cause.mission: Find a cure for Breast Cancer
cause.name: Breast Cancer 3-Day
